text: [Muziek]
greetings My name is mat word and I'm
Here at AWS headquarters in Seattle To
Give You An update on the Amazon Elastic
Block Store EBS EBS Provides persistent
high performance Block Storage for use
with Amazon ec2 The Dynamic Nature of
EBS workloads Often requires customers
to increase volume size adjust
Performance or Change volume type in
order to optim for capacity Performance
or Cost example as databases grow over
Time They May require customers to move
Their data to a larger or More high
performance volume to do this Today most
customers Create a Snapshot of Their
volume restore that Snapshot to a new
volume and finally attach the new volume
to the ec2 instance If this is a
Production workload customers will also
have to schedule Down Time Which means
doing This after Hours Today We are
introducing a new evs feature called
Elastic volumes that greatly simplify
the process of modifying volumes with
Elastic volumes you can increase
capacity tune Performance and Change
volume types with a single click On The
Fly Without disruption This Means you
can plan and Deploy based on your Needs
grow your volume tune The iops or change
the volume type as your workload Needs
Evolve you can also use Cloud watch With
lambda or Cloud formation to automate
your changes to get started Simply Sign
Into the AWS management console Select
ec2 and Right click on the volume you
wish to modify to learn More check webs
thanks
a
y
